Entries.Hazel: Wow I need this for a spell I'm working on! Thank you!/225 74 876 896 155 268/This could come in useful, thank you./-2 -28/What exactly do you expect me to do with this?/-6 -5 -27/Are you trying to curse me?? Why would you give me this?/-80 -20/Thanks./-75 -79 -4

Entries.Rainy_Day_Hazel: Rain? I'm glad I brought the portal with me when I moved in.
Entries.Rainy_Night_Hazel: Can you hear the rain spirits? They're screaming so much tonight.
Entries.Indoor_Day_Hazel: Junimo dust, void essence, fairy rose, garlic oil... Yes I think I have all the ingredients I need for now.
Entries.Indoor_Night_Hazel: How was your day dear? I missed you.
Entries.jobLeave_Hazel: I'm opening the shop today, you should come visit if you get the chance.
Entries.jobReturn_Hazel: It was such a long day today. 5 different Goblins came in demanding essence of wormtail.
Entries.spring_Hazel: Now the festive season is over, I should really start stocking up my supplies.
Entries.summer_Hazel: I hate this, the heat really messes up the arcane properties of my newts eye.
Entries.fall_Hazel: It's finally fall!$h#$b#I can't wait for all hallows eve so I can go out without being judged.
Entries.winter_Hazel: It's so cold outside. $u#$b#I'll have to get a fire going in the hut.
Entries.spouseRoom_Hazel: I'm just brewing some potions before I start the day. I have some new orders I need to work on.

Entries.Hazel_8: @,^Thank you for being such a good friend to me!^I have an important favour to ask of you, could you bring me a prismatic shard?^I'll tell you more when you bring it.  ^   -Hazel [#]I need your help!

Entries.Hazel_6: @, ^Since I have my curses under control, I've decided to use the extra time to open a shop, check the magic book in my hut for what I'm selling. ^    -Hazel

Entries.16304801: Black Slime Egg/6000/-300/Basic/Black Slime Egg/Can be hatched in a slime incubator.

Entries.16304008/f Hazel 2500/t 1200 2300: spirits_eve/12 38/farmer 12 29 2 Hazel 12 39 2/skippable/move farmer 0 7 2/faceDirection Hazel 0/pause 400/move farmer 0 2 2/speak Hazel "Hey! You came!"/pause 500/faceDirection Hazel 2/pause 200/move farmer 1 0 2/move farmer 0 1 3/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/playMusic echos/pause 1000/speak Hazel "Thank you for coming! I really appreciate it.#$b#I actually wanted to talk to you about something."/pause 2000/speak Hazel "Since we met I've felt my curse lifting and lifting and now it's gone..#$b#...#$b#Well, I realise what I was really feeling.#$b#I was falling in love with you."/pause 1000/speak Hazel "$q 16304902 null#Do you feel the same way?$s#$r 16304902 50 hazel_question3#Yes! I feel exactly the same way!#$r 16304902 -500 hazel_question4#No.. I'm sorry."/end

Entries.16304001/f Hazel 500: spirits_eve/7 9/Hazel 4 5 2 farmer 7 15 0/move Hazel 0 5 2/speak Hazel "Oh hello @."/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Hazel "Listen, I'm sorry I've been so rude to you.#$b#It's just been so hard since my breakup with Rasmodius. This curse just makes me so angry and out of control all the time."/speak Hazel "$q 16304901 null#Can you forgive me?$s#$r 16304901 50 hazel_question1#Of course! I understand.#$r 16304901 -250 hazel_question2#Absolutely not, you're a horrible person and you don't deserve my forgiveness."/end
Entries.16304002/f Hazel 1000: spirits_eve/7 9/Hazel 4 5 2 farmer 7 15 0/move Hazel 0 5 2/speak Hazel "@, you're here! Listen I think it's about time I tell you about my curse."/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Hazel "So as you know, when Rasmodius & I broke up I was cursed. But there's more to it than that.#$b#You see at the time, I was working on some new spells. They were incredibly dangerous spells, so I'd been trying to finalise them.#$b#I guess I was focusing too hard on them because Rasmodius was feeling neglected. #$b#So When I returned home one evening, he told me he'd had enough.#$b#Without thinking, I uttered one of my new spells in anger, but it wasn't ready yet and it backfired.#$b#So I turned green & I'm filled with this rage that I can't do anything about.#$b#Sometimes it gets completely out of control and I guess that's when I must curse your barns. I'm sorry."/end dialogue Hazel "Maybe one day they'll be a cure."
Entries.16304003/f Hazel 1500: spirits_eve/7 9/Hazel 4 5 2 farmer 7 15 0/move Hazel 0 5 2/speak Hazel "Great news @!"/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Hazel "I recently revisited my old spell book, I've been learning more and more about my curse and what caused it. #$b#I haven't quite figured out how to get better, but I don't think I'll lose control anymore.#$b#Hopefully you won't be visited anymore in the night on my rampages."/mail Hazel_6/end dialogue Hazel "I guess this means I won't be making any more midnight visits? Well unless you want me to."
Entries.16304004/e 16304005/f Hazel 2000/i 74: spirits_eve/7 9/Hazel 4 5 2 farmer 7 15 0/move Hazel 0 5 2/speak Hazel "@, you came. Oh good, you brought the shard."/move farmer 0 -5 0/move farmer -2 0 3/removeItem 74/speak Hazel "Thank you, I guess I should tell you why I need this.#$b#I've been studying more and I found a way to cure my curse.#$b#Let me show you, follow me."/move farmer 0 1 2/move Hazel 0 -1 1/move Hazel 7 0 1/move farmer 0 -1 1/move farmer 7 0 0/playSound dwop/pause 300/speak Hazel "Ok I think it's working! I'm not sure how long this will take, but come back and see me tomorrow!"/end dialogue Hazel "I hope this works! I just want to be me again.."

Entries.16304009/f Hazel 3500/O Hazel: spirits_eve/5 28/farmer 5 38 0 Hazel 5 28 0/skippable/move farmer 0 -9 0/emote Hazel 19/pause 400/faceDirection Hazel 2/speak Hazel "@! You're here!#$b#I suppose you're wondering why I'm here?#$b#Well, I figured it was time to speak to Rasmodius.#$b#I feel so much better since we married, but I think closure is important and we both have things to apologise for."/faceDirection Hazel 0/pause 800/faceDirection Hazel 2/speak Hazel "Will you come with me?"/move Hazel 0 -1 0/warp Hazel -100 -100/move farmer 0 -2 0/end position 5 27

Entries.16304010/O Hazel/e 16304009: spirits_eve/2 14/farmer 8 24 0 Hazel 8 22 0 Wizard 3 17 2/skippable/emote Wizard 19/speak Wizard "Hazel?? What are you doing here?"/move Hazel 0 -5 0/move Hazel -4 0 3/move farmer 0 -6 0/move farmer -2 0 3/speak Hazel "Rasmodius, I wanted to speak to you about our relationship.#$b#I'm sorry for how it ended, I shouldn't have tried to curse you."/speak Wizard "No you shouldn't have."/speak Hazel "Aren't you going to apologise for your part?"/emote Wizard 12/speak Wizard "What do I need to apologise for? You were out all the time, saying you were working, but who knows if that's true."/speak Hazel "It was true! I was working on my spells, that's how I ended up cursed, it wasn't ready yet.#$b#I was trying to make a better life for us. I just wanted to make sure we had enough money to see us through the next 100 years of our lives."/speak Wizard "Oh I guess I didn't realise. I'm sorry. I thought you were cheating on me."/emote Hazel 12/speak Hazel "How could you ever think that?$a#$b#I don't know why I felt the need to come here.$s#$b#I'm happy now. I'm married, @ makes me happy and I've never been happier.$a#$b#I have to leave. I love you @."/move Hazel 4 0 1/move Hazel 0 5 0/end dialogue Hazel "Thanks for coming with me @. Seeing him made me realise I don't need that closure.#$b# He'll never understand.#$b# And that's ok because I'm happy with you."
